name: CORGI JUMP
description:
This is 2D mini game.

  • for windows
  • action game
  • pixelart style
  • 4 stages, 10 minutes
  • arrow keys : move
  • space key : jump!
  • enter key : pause menu
  • resize window : edit "window_size.ini"
  • #corgiJam (https://itch.io/jam/corgi-jam)
Rules
  • jump over foxes and get points
  • eat apples to grow
  • gain extra lives by scoring specific amounts of points
System requirements
  • Windows 7+
  • DirectX runtime library
BGM
  • PANICPUMPKIN http://pansound.com
  • MoppySound http://moppysound.seesaa.net/
